pros: CCP is a great place to work at! They truly care for their members and providers and the community overall. I had a lot of growth opportunities and I am very thankful to have had the leadership and mentors to guide me through my tenure at CCP.
cons: The only con I have is not able to be fully remote.

job_title: RN Case Manager in Sunrise, FL
pros: Great bonuses, management cares, hybrid schedule, great coworkers
cons: Benefits are not great, no maternity leave, insurance is not great

pros: Offers gift cards to rate the company on Google (bribery).
cons: 1. Control freaks 2. Low paid 3. Holidays are taken from PTO 4. Salary employees must sign in and out 5. Did I mention controlling 6. .....

job_title: RN Case Manager in Sunrise, FL
pros: Excellent company, great team work, good salary and benefits.
cons: You need to go one day at week to the office.

job_title: Senior Systems Administrator in Sunrise, FL
pros: clean office and people are polite
cons: I am a former employee who was there for 7 months, received nothing but praise from my superiors at multiple levels until I expressed my concern of nepotism in my department. I was suddenly given a disingenuous critique and told I was so bad that I needed to completely change everything I was doing. Oh, without explanation or a single example. My wife and I could draw no other conclusion than the request was simply bullying and informed management that I would not be bullied. Be careful hitching your wagon to this organization.

review_title: Used To Be A Great Company to Work For
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Fort Lauderdale, FL
pros: Good location.  Easy access to highways.
cons: Some departments have mandatory overtime.  Work quota's that are unreasonable.  Very stressful environment.  Favoritism for less qualified employees.  Older and long term employees are micromanaged in the hopes they will leave.

pros:
I have been working at CCP for 6 months and can not believe how much employees are appreciated. Leadership is approachable and have an open door policy. At other companies  you do not  know what the CEO looks like. 
Not at CCP!!!

We have appreciation lunches, ice cream just because and  I have learned a lot in the 6 months working here at CCP.
cons: I wish the parking situation was better and we could park closer to our building.

review_title: Adult Day Care center with terrible people.
job_title: Provider Operations Representative in Sunrise, FL
pros: Medical benefits are available through Memorial Hospital and Broward Health.
cons: Terrible management and evil employees. This is the place everyone runs away from. Employees have no idea what they are doing and management wants you to lie on reports to make your department sound like it's successful. You have to use your accrued PTO to cover holidays when the company is closed or you don't get paid. High turn over because people quit due to the horrible treatment from management and senior management like the V'S and HR.

review_title: Some departments have great managers but some is so micro manage. Salary is not generous but they have bonus yearly.
pros: Surrounded by wonderful hardworking and kind employees

job_title: Provider Operations Representative in Sunrise, FL
pros: Up and coming, I was able to learn a lot from this company. Built from scratch. Was a part of implementing new policies.
cons: Not a lot of growth from within. Very political.
